lead_paragraph: The Irish government said that it expected to inject billions more into two of the largest banks in the country.
snippet: The Irish government said that it expected to inject billions more into two of the largest banks in the country.

headline.main: Ireland, Hoping to Calm Investors, Takes Over a 2nd Troubled Bank
headline.seo: Ireland Takes Over Allied Irish as Bailout Bill Rises
headline.print_headline: Ireland, Hoping to Calm Investors, Takes Over a 2nd Troubled Bank

byline.contributor: Chris V. Nicholson contributed reporting from Paris.
